flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 60 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=60>>60
45% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
He has 2.7 friends who are girls because 60 x 0.45 = <<2.7=2.7>>2.7
#### 2.7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26.999999999999996, not 2.7. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
